name: Trello-desktop
body:
A mac electron app which wraps Trello so you can use it as a desktop application rather than a web app. 

To install, download the package and unzip it. Navigate to the `trello-desktop-darwin-x64/`directory and copy the `trello-desktop.app` to your applications folder or desktop.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
